A bit about myself

Hi, I'm Daniel and I'm a front-end developer. I've always been a creative person who loved to dream up and create new things. That's why I think I felt such a strong pull towards development when I was first introduced to it in a coding game. I realized that through coding the possibilities for creation were seemingly endless, and the tools to learn how are readily available. I love to learn new technologies and apply them to the projects that I am working on. The best part is that all I need to continue learning more is my laptop and an internet connection. I really look forward to seeing and being a part of the future of technology, everything is changing fast and that's exciting.

The portfolio

I have worked on quite a few projects since I started web development a few years ago, here are some that I have selected to share. Some of these are client work and some are just personal projects created while on the journy to learn something new.
